snippet.title: Nintendo DS Longplay [083] Mega Man ZX (a)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: xRavenXP

Mega Man ZX is a game series Mega Man Capcom for Nintendo DS, and the first game of the sub-franchise Mega Man ZX. The game is set 200 years after the end of Mega Man Zero series. Very great game. The game is played by characters Vent and Aile, apparently twins, but have differences in personality, Aile is a energetic girl and Vent is a tough kid.

They work with the Giro in the Giro Express, specializing in the supply of products, whether they are legal or illegal. After the incident with the Mavericks, they are cast into a cliff and are attacked by a metal viper. But thanks to the power of X Biometal, they can defeat the enemy.

But many secrets about the BioMetals await our heroes, Giro ends up being controlled by Serpent, the commander of the Mavericks, who want at all costs to get the power of Model W. Each model gives to character the abilities of the characters Megaman (X), Zero (Z, Zx), Harpuia (Hx), Phantom (Px), Fefnir (Fx) and Leviathan (Lx) and are obtained by defeating bosses, Omega Zero (Ox) was the only Model that was not created by Ciel ... unfortunately the X ends up being lost by being the basis for all others. Under the supervision of Prairie, Vent and Aile seeking to eradicate threats Serpent and their guardians once and for all. 

This alternative longplay was played with the character Vent (including all subtanks, all life ups and all dialogues and their cutscenes, since they differ in this game), the version with the Aile was played by Tsunao that version he could keep Model X and get all discs (I collected a lot of Discs, but unfortunately did not have time to view them.) Enjoy!   ;)

For Tsunao version click here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g6aoBovawvE -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
